location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to John Best, Marine Paymaster, Bombay

mods.abstract: In this letter Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, requests that a sum of 4313 rupees (the amount advanced to two of the Company's cruisers, the Auroraand the Ternate) be paid to the Honourable Governor in Council.
